Unlocks music in practice
Make sure to enable it in the settings.

main-menu.name: Switch menu button
main-menu.description: If true, switches the 'search' button in the main menu with a 'create' button

old-twitter-icon.name: Old Twitter Icon
old-twitter-icon.description: Toggle on to change the X icon to the twitter icon.
